name: @slcorp/file-bundle
description: A clean architecture File bundle for Symfony

scripts.build: npm run copy-vendor && npm run build-js && npm run build-scss
scripts.copy-vendor: npm run copy-vendor-dropzone && npm run copy-vendor-jquery-file-upload && npm run copy-vendor-bluimp && npm run copy-vendor-plupload && npm run copy-vendor-fine-uploader
scripts.copy-vendor-jquery-file-upload: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/vendor/img && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/js/vendor/jquery.ui.widget.js src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.ui.widget.js && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/js/jquery.iframe-transport.js src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.iframe-transport.js && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/js/jquery.fileupload.js src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.fileupload.js && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/js/jquery.fileupload-process.js src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.fileupload-process.js && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/js/jquery.fileupload-validate.js src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.fileupload-validate.js && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/js/jquery.fileupload-ui.js src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.fileupload-ui.js && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/css/jquery.fileupload.css src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.fileupload.css && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/css/jquery.fileupload-ui.css src/Resources/public/vendor/jquery-file-upload/jquery.fileupload-ui.css && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/img/progressbar.gif src/Resources/public/vendor/img/progressbar.gif && cp node_modules/blueimp-file-upload/img/loading.gif src/Resources/public/vendor/img/loading.gif
scripts.copy-vendor-fine-uploader: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/vendor/fine-uploader && cp node_modules/fine-uploader/fine-uploader/fine-uploader.min.js src/Resources/public/vendor/fine-uploader/fine-uploader.min.js && cp node_modules/fine-uploader/fine-uploader/fine-uploader.min.css src/Resources/public/vendor/fine-uploader/fine-uploader.min.css && cp node_modules/fine-uploader/fine-uploader/loading.gif src/Resources/public/vendor/fine-uploader/loading.gif && cp node_modules/fine-uploader/fine-uploader/processing.gif src/Resources/public/vendor/fine-uploader/processing.gif && cp node_modules/fine-uploader/fine-uploader/edit.gif src/Resources/public/vendor/fine-uploader/edit.gif
scripts.build-js: npm run build-js-dropzone && npm run build-js-jquery-file-upload && npm run build-js-bluimp && npm run build-js-plupload && npm run build-js-fine-uploader
scripts.build-js-dropzone: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/js && cp assets/js/dropzone-widget.js src/Resources/public/js/dropzone-widget.js && cp assets/js/dropzone.d.ts src/Resources/public/js/dropzone.d.ts
scripts.build-js-jquery-file-upload: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/js && cp assets/js/jquery-file-upload-widget.js src/Resources/public/js/jquery-file-upload-widget.js && cp assets/js/jquery-file-upload.d.ts src/Resources/public/js/jquery-file-upload.d.ts
scripts.build-js-bluimp: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/js && cp assets/js/bluimp-widget.js src/Resources/public/js/bluimp-widget.js && cp assets/js/jquery-file-upload.d.ts src/Resources/public/js/bluimp.d.ts
scripts.build-js-plupload: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/js && cp assets/js/plupload-widget.js src/Resources/public/js/plupload-widget.js && cp assets/js/plupload.d.ts src/Resources/public/js/plupload.d.ts
scripts.build-js-fine-uploader: mkdir -p src/Resources/public/js && cp assets/js/fine-uploader-widget.js src/Resources/public/js/fine-uploader-widget.js && cp assets/js/fine-uploader.d.ts src/Resources/public/js/fine-uploader.d.ts
scripts.build-scss: npm run build-scss-dropzone && npm run build-scss-jquery-file-upload && npm run build-scss-bluimp && npm run build-scss-plupload && npm run build-scss-fine-uploader
